title: New: Oisima – Melting Paraiso
content:
I’ve been keeping a close eye on Oisima for a while now, and this track reaffirms my belief that they are one of the hottest producers around at the moment.

With a debut EP in the works, Oisima has dropped a new cut in the form of the enthralling Melting Paraiso. The vivid atmosphere conjured up is quite unlike anything I’ve heard recently, verging upon shoegaze at times, but grounded amongst electronic influences. Anyway, enough talk, check out Melting Paraiso below.

melting paraiso by Oisima
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
